exec: console.log("Here we wait 90 seconds - be patient. The reasons is that the previous operation erased running-config and it is necessary to wait to restart services on the device.");
pm.expect(tx1).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for transaction " + pm.environment.get("transaction_id1"));
pm.expect(tx2).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the second transaction ");
pm.expect(meta1).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the device " + pm.environment.get("node_id"));
pm.expect(meta2).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the device " + pm.environment.get("nodeVNF16_id"));

pm.expect(meta2["diff"][0]["data-after"]).to.eql("{\"interfaces:interfaces\": {\"tvi\": [{\"mode\": \"ipsec\", \"name\": \"tvi-0/9\", \"type\": \"p2mp-esp\", \"unit\": [{\"name\": 0, \"enable\": true, \"family\": {\"inet\": {\"address\": [{\"addr\": \"10.4.64.105/32\"}]}}}], \"enable\": true, \"description\": \"ESP Tunnel Interface for Customer3 Control VR\"}]}}");
pm.expect(tx1).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for transaction " + pm.environment.get("transaction_id1"));
pm.expect(tx2).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the second transaction " + pm.environment.get("transaction_id2"));
pm.expect(tx2).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the second transaction " + pm.environment.get("transaction_id2"));
pm.expect(meta1).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the device " + pm.environment.get("node_id"));
pm.expect(meta2).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the device " + pm.environment.get("nodeVNF16_id"));

pm.expect(meta2["diff"][0]["data-after"]).to.eql("{\"interfaces:interfaces\": {\"tvi\": [{\"mode\": \"ipsec\", \"name\": \"tvi-0/9\", \"type\": \"p2mp-esp\", \"unit\": [{\"name\": 0, \"enable\": true, \"family\": {\"inet\": {\"address\": [{\"addr\": \"10.4.64.105/32\"}]}}}], \"enable\": true, \"description\": \"ESP Tunnel Interface for Customer3 Control VR\"}]}}");
pm.expect(tx3).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the third transaction ");
pm.expect(meta1).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the device " + pm.environment.get("node_id"));
pm.expect(tx1).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for transaction " + pm.environment.get("transaction_id1"));
pm.expect(tx2).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the second transaction " + pm.environment.get("transaction_id2"));
pm.expect(meta1).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the device " + pm.environment.get("node_id"));
pm.expect(meta2).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the device " + pm.environment.get("nodeVNF16_id"));

pm.expect(meta2["diff"][0]["data-after"]).to.eql("{\"interfaces:interfaces\": {\"tvi\": [{\"mode\": \"ipsec\", \"name\": \"tvi-0/9\", \"type\": \"p2mp-esp\", \"unit\": [{\"name\": 0, \"enable\": true, \"family\": {\"inet\": {\"address\": [{\"addr\": \"10.4.64.105/32\"}]}}}], \"enable\": true, \"description\": \"ESP Tunnel Interface for Customer3 Control VR\"}]}}");
pm.expect(tx3).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the third transaction " + pm.environment.get("transaction_id3"));
pm.expect(meta1).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the device " + pm.environment.get("node_id"));
(m => m["transaction-id"] != pm.environment.get("transaction_id1") && m["transaction-id"] != pm.environment.get("transaction_id2") && m["transaction-id"] != pm.environment.get("transaction_id3"));
pm.expect(tx4).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the fourth transaction ");
pm.expect(meta1).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the device " + pm.environment.get("node_id"));
pm.expect(meta2).to.be.an("object", "Could not find metadata for the device " + pm.environment.get("nodeVNF16_id"));

pm.expect(diff0m2["data-before"]).to.eql("{\"interfaces:interfaces\": {\"tvi\": [{\"mode\": \"ipsec\", \"name\": \"tvi-0/9\", \"type\": \"p2mp-esp\", \"unit\": [{\"name\": 0, \"enable\": true, \"family\": {\"inet\": {\"address\": [{\"addr\": \"10.4.64.105/32\"}]}}}], \"enable\": true, \"description\": \"ESP Tunnel Interface for Customer3 Control VR\"}]}}");
